room_title: Escape room "Escape San Quentin" by Locked Up Bloomington in Bloomington (IN)
room_description:
Welcome to East Block of the San Quentin State Prison, which houses 537 men facing execution. You’ve been wrongfully accused of a crime and sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole. Your new “home” is a cell, that once belonged to an inmate who disappeared without a trace… or did he?
Some claim he escaped. Others swear he was murdered by the infamously cruel warden. But no one actually knows… Can you trace the steps to escape, before you suffer the same fate?
